title: Education
description: Education refers to the systematic process of facilitating learning, acquiring knowledge, skills, values, and habits through various methods such as teaching, training, and research. It plays a crucial role in shaping individuals and societies. In relation to politics, education policy involves government decisions about the funding, administration, and curriculum of educational institutions. Political debates often focus on issues like educational equity, school choice, teacher salaries, and standardized testing. Education systems are seen as vital for national development, economic growth, and promoting democratic values.
